38590.name: Height (Baten and Blum 2015)
38590.description: Heights by birth decade and country, both before and after 1800.
38590.datasetName: Clio-Infra - Biological Standards of Living - Baten and Blum (2015)

source.name: Height (Baten and Blum 2015)
source.dataPublishedBy:
For the post-1800 period: Baten, Joerg and Matthias Blum, “Growing Taller, but Unequal: Biological Well-Being in World Regions and Its Determinants, 1810-1989.” Economic History of Developing Regions (2012) 

For the pre-1800 period: Koepke, Nikola and Baten, Joerg "The Biological Standard of Living in Europe During the Last Two Millennia," in European Review of Economic History 9-1 (2005)
source.additionalInfo: Additional information: Methodologies used for data collection and processing. Reconstruction of heights by birth decade using a variety of different sources. Please see link for the complete list.
